data.comment: The match has started.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 3, Lorenzo Reyes for Atlas drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for America in the half of Atlas.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Atlas have a dangerous throw-in.
Ignacio Malcorra (Atlas) strikes at Estadio Azteca but his header is cleared.
Leonardo Suarez gets his shot on target but fails to score for America.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Jorge Sanchez (America) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atlas pushes forward through Javier Correa, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jesus Angulo for Atlas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
It seems as if Jesus Angulo is unable to continue. Brayton Vazquez replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Mexico City Atlas attack through Renato Ibarra. The finish is off target, however.
Diego Montano Robles awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to America.
Throw-in America.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to America's area.
In the minute 19, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a Atlas throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for America in the half of Atlas.
America's Federico Vinas breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
America surge into the attack at Estadio Azteca but Federico Vinasâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 25, Atlas have a goal kick.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 28, Richard Sanchez for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Azteca.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 32, Free kick America.
German Conti (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Diego Montano Robles.
America's Henry Martin goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Atlas in the half of America.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atlas needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Atlas have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 41, In Mexico City, Sebastian Caceres (America) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Azteca.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 44, America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
America to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, America to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, America are pushing forward but Federico Vinas's finish is wide of the goal.
Henry Martin (America) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Diego Montano Robles awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Diego Montano Robles blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Renato Ibarra of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Jairo Torres is on a sub for Ignacio Jeraldino for Atlas.
In the minute 47, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Free kick in a good position for America!
At Estadio Azteca, Renato Ibarra has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Mexico City America drive forward through Richard Sanchez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 50, Atlas needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
America's Henry Martin is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick America.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
America's Santiago Caseres has been booked in Mexico City.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to America.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 60, Lorenzo Reyes is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
America's Sebastian Cordova gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 62, Atlas's Lorenzo Reyes is back in action after a slight knock.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giovani Dos Santos is replacing Santiago Caseres for the home team.
In the minute 64, America's Federico Vinas misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 65, Atlas drives forward and Ignacio Malcorra gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Federico Vinas for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
America drive upfield and Jorge Sanchez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlas defender.
In the minute 67, The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Camilo Vargas, who is down injured.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Federico Vinas (America) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Azteca.
Atlas's Camilo Vargas looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
Throw-in Atlas.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for America in their own half.
Richard Sanchez of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
America have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 73, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Richard Sanchez (America) has received a first yellow card.
Henry Martin for America has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Sebastian Cordova with Andres Ibarguen.
Atlas push forward at Estadio Azteca and Jesus Isijara gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the America defence.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, Diego Montano Robles awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atlas make their third substitution with Edyairth Ortega replacing Renato Ibarra.
In the minute 78, Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for America, close to Atlas's area.
Free kick America.
Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra has been booked in Mexico City.
In the minute 80, America pushes forward through Leonardo Suarez, whose finish on goal is saved.
America have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for America in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 81, Diego Montano Robles signals a America throw-in in Atlas's half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andres Ibarguen (America) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Atlas are coming forward and Edyairth Ortega gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Diego Montano Robles awards America a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Free kick for America in the half of Atlas.
America make their third substitution with Alonso Escoboza replacing Luis Fuentes.
America push forward at Estadio Azteca and Federico Vinas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlas defence.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to America.
Jorge Sanchez heads in to make it 1-0 at Estadio Azteca.
Leonardo Suarez with an assist there.
Atlas drive forward but Javier Correa is judged offside.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Brayan Trejo of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
At Estadio Azteca, America are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Azteca.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Americaâ€™s Leonardo Suarez is on his feet again at Estadio Azteca.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 1-0.
Brayan Trejo is on a sub for Brayton Vazquez for Atlas.
Diego Montano Robles waits before resuming play because Leonardo Suarez for America is still down.
